channel.title: Need help getting drops working in pvp!
channel.description:
HI, i'm codeing a Delta based source at the moment, i'm having some probelms making players drop the items they have when they die. I've noticed that when a player dies, they die on 1HP as opposed to 0HP, could this be thr problem? if so how do i change this? I would be highly gratefull if anyone could post their oppinions on what i should do, thanks for reading!
~JC~
